data.name: The Man Came Around Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Man Came Around is a point-and-click thriller filled with tough choices in a time of crisis.
Occida, one of the most powerful nations of the world, is shaken by mass protests. As the fight between The Many -an activist organization- and the government intensifies, the protesters face brutal repression.

Play five citizens trying to leave this mess.
Your only hope is to cross the Northern Border, a heavily guarded fence lost in the middle of the mountains.

You’ll face grave dangers during your trip, between the deadly elements and the corrupt cops. Manage your scarce resources, take tough decisions and make the best of your group abilities to escape this lethal maze.

But remember: sometimes staying alive is not the same as doing the right thing… Will you sacrifice your principles in order to survive?



Moral Choices: Sacrificing a member, making shady deals, or letting innocents die in order to survive ... You'll face tough decisions during the adventure.

Interactive Narration: Let your choices change the story. Replay to discover all possibilities.

Group Survival: Permadeath for the characters! It’s up to you to finish the game with five or only one survivors.

Trauma System: Stress and guilt will impact your characters.

Lost in a Maze: Explore a labyrinthine world full of secrets.

Unique Art Style: The hand-drawn graphics are inspired by minimalism and speed painting.

Political fable: The story explores how a democratic system can fall, ruined by special interests. And asks the crucial question: How could it happen?

data.short_description: The Man Came Around is a point-and-click thriller filled with tough choices. Occida is shaken by mass protests. As the fight between The Many -an activist organization- and the government intensifies, the protesters are faced with brutal repression. Play five citizens trying to leave this mess.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 - 64 bits
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
